citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:30pm on 25-
SEPT-2023. The inspector knocked on the door and called the number listed on the account. The licensee answered but
was not able to return to the facility within an hour.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:30pm on 25-
SEPT-2023. The inspector knocked on the door and called the number listed on the account. The licensee answered but 
was not able to return to the facility within an hour. 
 
 
End Section
